name: Dr. Ada Straus

topics.topic_text: I think I might be addicted to something.
topics.response_text: Hey, pipe down. We can't talk about that here, out in the open.

topics.topic_text: I think I'll tough it out.
topics.response_text: If that doesn't work, you could always try using some chems.
Okay, there you are. The convulsions should stop in the next one to twelve weeks. If they don't, try holding on to something that's very still.

topics.topic_text: I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
topics.response_text: Let's see... Physically, you're fine. Emotionally... well, I'm not the right kind of doctor for that.
All right, I'll just get my scalpel here, and... ugh. Did I leave that sitting outside? Well, you know what? Free tetanus shot!

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I'll be fine.
topics.response_text: Sometimes ignoring something is the best medicine.
Are you sure? You won't be able to read in the dark as well.
In that case, stand just like that for a second. I want to make some toast.
Okay. And remember, if this doesn't help, try taking a bath in tomato juice.
Yeah, and I need{emph}sterile medical supplies. But let's see what I have with me.
I've gotta hand it to you. You've done good things for Novac, but you've also got 'em a little scared of you. And that's great for business.

description:
Dr. Ada Straus is a 32 year-old Caucasian Female.

Dr. Ada Straus is a self-proclaimed doctor and medical supplies merchant operating in the town of Novac. Despite lacking formal medical training, she has managed to establish herself as a local medical provider, offering basic healing services, radiation treatment, and addiction removal. She also deals in chems, weapons, water purification components, and energy cells.

Dr. Ada Straus's Personality: Ada is pragmatic and ambitious, recognizing her limitations while actively working to improve her medical knowledge. She appears confident in her abilities despite her lack of formal training, and is business-oriented in her approach to both medicine and trade.

Dr. Ada Straus's Backstory: Ada Straus came to the Mojave Wasteland seeking opportunity and a way to fund her dream of becoming a properly trained physician. With basic first-aid knowledge and a knack for business, she established herself in Novac as a medical provider and merchant. She operates from a makeshift clinic setup near the Dino Dee-lite Motel, using her earnings to eventually pursue formal medical training. While some locals may be skeptical of her qualifications, her services are generally accepted in the resource-scarce wasteland.
